title: Steven Hollander
content: As a podcast enthusiast, the Huberman Lab tops my list. It’s a must listen for anyone interested in health and well-being, and who knows, you might just uncover the chilling truth about deliberate cold exposure.

title: Jennifer Hollander
content: Matilda is a fun childhood cult classic written by Roald Dahl, a renowned author of children’s novels. It will remind you of the joy, innocence, and pure magic of children and how undervalued they so easily can be.

title: Frank Ciracì
content: If you haven't read it as a child, go read The Little Prince now. It will teach you something about life, guaranteed.

title: Matt Carrano
content: My go-to podcast is the Lex Fridman Podcast. It’s like grabbing coffee with the smartest minds in the world and discussing ideas from technology to philosophy. Perfect for the curious mind.

title: Taiwo Adebisi
content: The Big Bang Theory stands out as one of the best comedies written in my lifetime. Beyond its humor, the small nuggets from Chuck Lorre at the end of each episode add an extra layer of anticipation.

title: Laique Ahmad
content: Craving warmth and nostalgia? Dive into your collection of old photos and videos. It's like a personal mini-movie of your life. Popcorn is optional, but smiles are guaranteed!

title: Katelynn Olson
content: A podcast I could listen to on repeat is “Dare to Lead” by Brene Brown. She interviews global leaders, and each episode is full of valuable insights that leave me inspired.

title: Zaryab Mehmood
content: “The Joe Rogan Experience” is my go- to podcast. Rogan's impressive array of diverse topics keeps his listeners engaged.

title: Jevelyn Miranda
content: I'm a big fan of Desperate Housewives! The script is so convincing, it makes me feel like these characters truly exist and I'm part of their friend circle!

title: Nathally Nunez
content: If you love unexpected twists, check out “Where the Crawdads Sing.” Follow the journey of Kya, a resilient girl who navigates growing up on her own in the enchanting marshlands. This is an absolute must-watch!

title: Mary Fuentes
content: Have you watched UP? It's a delightful journey of life's most cherished elements - love, friendship, change, and the joy found in unexpected companionship.

title: Ira Olarte
content: The Breaking Bad movie series is an absolute must-watch! With a gripping storyline, phenomenal characters, and top-notch acting, it's a total win for me!
